Banner.Description: In a few words, I am a software engineer with expertise in backend development, primarily using Java , Python and Scala. I possess a strong background in capital markets and investment banking, contributing to my well-rounded skillset. My communication abilities complement my technical prowess, making me a valuable asset in the software development and financial sectors.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Throughout my humble experience, I've developed exceptional interpersonal abilities and proficient technical expertise that allow me to engage effectively with diverse clientele. I'm enthusiastic about facing challenges as they provide opportunities for growth and enhancement in order to deliver outstanding results.
Additionally, I possess the ability to enhance systems, optimize websites, establish standardized patterns, and propose and implement valuable ideas to enhance the project I am involved in.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Backend Developer
Description: Integration of APIs provided by a stock exchange that offers real-time market data such as stock prices, trading volumes, and buy and sell orders.
Development of user-friendly interfaces using JavaFX to enable traders to interact with financial systems and data.
Implementation of business logic and management rules to ensure precise payment operations in compliance with regulations.

Design and development of an asynchronous transaction confirmation service using Java and Spring. This service enabled real-time processing of a high volume of transactions without affecting the overall system performance, thus providing an enhanced user experience.
Collaboration with DevOps teams to deploy, manage, and monitor backend services in production environments, utilizing Docker and CI/CD pipelines.
Ability to understand client needs, identify issues, and propose tailored solutions to enhance processes and systems.

Experience.Jobs.Title: End-of-studies Internship
Description: Design and development of an interactive and dynamic real estate website using Angular for the frontend, and Laravel for the backend, ensuring high traffic, exclusive services, and an optimal user experience.
Creation of RESTful services to feed real-time data into the user interface based on dynamic user input, with comprehensive testing of these APIs using POSTMAN.
Optimization of SQL queries and database access in MySQL to ensure high performance of the website.
Integration of advanced security mechanisms to safeguard sensitive user data.
Close collaboration with the team to adhere to the Agile Scrum methodology, ensuring timely delivery of features and effective response to required changes.
Thorough documentation writing to explain and detail various parts of the code, promoting better understanding and smooth future development.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Internship
Description: Design and development of web applications.
Database: Modeling and implementation of the ORM layer.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Internship
Description: Participated in the new Fixed Wireless Broadband Access (FWBA) Project.
Worked with Level 2 IT Support to customize settings for personal preference, protecting data, expanding and troubleshooting.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Banco Santander & Wimbee training projects
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Throughout my training and experiences, my focus has been on finance, encompassing a variety of courses and tasks. At Banco Santander, I engaged in a spectrum of courses that significantly enriched my skill set. Starting with Bash scripting, I mastered task automation, boosting efficiency in command-line operations. The Git CLI course laid a crucial foundation in version control. Understanding data organization and querying, learned through the Oracle databases course, proved vital for backend development. Python training equipped me with versatile programming skills, while JavaFX honed my ability to craft engaging desktop applications. Progressing through Spring, Flask, and Scala training, I deepened my understanding of constructing robust applications using diverse frameworks. Lastly, hands-on experience in the Spark project, utilizing Scala, heightened my ability to process and analyze large-scale financial data, providing invaluable insights into capital markets and finance. These courses and tasks collectively emphasized my dedication to excelling in the realm of finance and technology.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Portfolio v2.0
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An enhanced version 2.0 of my portfolio. A meticulously designed static website developed using Angular. This iteration focused on refining the user experience and adding new features to provide a more immersive and informative journey for visitors.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Portfolio v1.0
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This portfolio is a labor of love, born from my desire to showcase my work in a visually appealing and functional manner. It features various components that highlight my experience, projects, and areas of expertise.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: My New Place
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A comprehensive real estate platform that revolutionized the way people find, rent, or buy homes. This platform focused on providing users with accurate property availability and in-depth property information while incorporating modern conveniences like digital contract signing and secure online payments.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Unitech Desktop
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Introducing the Desktop version of a Virtual University Platform, a thoughtfully constructed n-tier Java application. The desktop interface harmoniously connects to a web application built on the Symfony framework and a mobile app crafted with Codename One. These components work in unison with a centralized remote database, striving to enhance the educational experience for students and facilitate operational efficiency for university staff, all while maintaining a humble approach to its capabilities and offerings.
Technologies: Java FX, Codename ONE, MySQL, GitLab

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Unitech Web
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Aligned with its desktop counterpart, the Java-based Virtual University Platform extends to the web through a Symfony 3.4 PHP Framework. This web version utilizes RESTful APIs, ensuring optimal interaction with a remote database. This integration streamlines data flow and actions, guaranteeing a seamless experience for users. By leveraging the strengths of the Symfony framework and adhering to RESTful principles, it enhances efficiency and accessibility.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Obladi, RESTO-CAFÉ
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Collaborated within a team to design the user interface, layout, and front-end features of a web application tailored for Obladi Café-Resto. Employed HTML , CSS , jQuery , and JavaScript to meet the client's requirements, resulting in an intuitive and visually appealing online platform for Obladi

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: DARI, Loan Simulator
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Dari is a web application intended for all residents, visitors who want to buy/rent property in a city. The credit simulation module I've worked on is used to determine if the user meets the financial requirements for a real estate purchase.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Unitech Mobile
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Matching its desktop and web counterparts, the application extends to a mobile app built with Codename One. The app syncs with the platform through a RESTful API, guaranteeing smooth usability and efficient data flow, further enhancing accessibility and user experience.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Smart Supermarket desktop application
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Contributed to a team effort in developing a desktop application for a smart supermarket with a focus on Inventory Management using C++ in QT Creator. Integrated Oracle db to ensure efficient data management. Employed TortoiseSVN for version control and code management processes.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FPS Desktop Game
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Led the development of a 2D FPS desktop game using C and SDL library. Designed game assets like maps and models using Adobe products. Operated in a Linux environment via a VMware virtual machine, successfully running the game on CentOS.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: Feel free to reach out and connect! Whether you have a project in mind, a collaboration proposal, or simply want to say hello, I'd love to hear from you. You can reach me via email or connect with me on LinkedIn for professional networking
